author: guitargeek
body: In response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/23766, where the electron MVA category was randomly -1 in the new implementation based on the `StringCutObjectSelector<>`, I can still propose this hot fix where the electron MVA categories are again hard coded. This is an alternative to reverting https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/23700 which the release managers can consider.
title: Hardcoded findCategory in Ele MVA again
